content.en: Enhancing OS-ELM: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the stability and performance of the online sequential extreme learning machine (OS-ELM), an algorithm used for various machine learning tasks. They have developed different variations of the OS-ELM, such as the ensemble of online sequential extreme learning machine (EOS-ELM), regularized OS-ELM based on bi-objective optimization, OS-ELM with a forgetting mechanism (FOS-ELM), and more. These advancements aim to enhance the OS-ELM's ability to handle noisy data, nonstationary systems, regression problems, improper number of hidden nodes, time-varying environments, and other challenges in classification and prediction tasks.
content.da: Forbedring af OS-ELM: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre stabiliteten og ydelsen af den online sekventielle ekstrem læringsmaskine (OS-ELM), en algoritme der anvendes til forskellige maskinlæringsopgaver. De har udviklet forskellige variationer af OS-ELM, såsom ensemblet af online sekventiel ekstrem læringsmaskine (EOS-ELM), reguleret OS-ELM baseret på bi-objektiv optimering, OS-ELM med en glemme mekanisme (FOS-ELM) og flere. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at forbedre OS-ELM's evne til at håndtere støjfyldte data, ikke-stationære systemer, regressionsproblemer, forkert antal skjulte noder, tidsvarierende miljøer og andre udfordringer inden for klassifikations- og prædiktionsopgaver.
